mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_NO IN (SELECT PRO_NO FROM ORDER_DETAIL GROUP BY PRO_NO ORDER BY COUNT(PRO_NO) DESC, PRO_NO DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY)
SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE ATT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATT_FNO = '1' AND ATT_CATEGORY = '4'

SELECT AUC_NO, AUC_FINISH_PRICE, CON_AUTHOR, CON_PRODUCT, ATT_RENAME FROM AUCTION JOIN ATTACHMENT ON(AUC_CNO = ATT_BNO) JOIN CONSIGNMENT ON(CON_NO = ATT_BNO) WHERE AUC_START_DATE <= SYSDATE AND AUC_FINISH_DATE >= SYSDATE AND ATT_CATEGORY = '2' AND ATT_FNO = '0' ORDER BY AUC_FINISH_PRICE DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
